title: Virtual URI Mapping
description: Virtual URI Mappings for Magnolia CMS https://documentation.magnolia-cms.com/display/DOCS/Virtual+URI+mapping

class.description: Class that performs the mapping and defines the configuration.

fromUri.description: Pattern to match in the requested URI.

toUri.description: Concrete URI where the request is mapped to. You can use prefixes forward, redirect or permanment (301 redirect).

site.description: Specifies the site that should be used for the mapping.
